attributes.action: Further controls on the sale of fireworks.
attributes.background:
We currently have children throwing fireworks at each other on the streets. It’s a danger to themselves and innocent people in the street. 
Also it causes a lot of distress to the animals. The sale of fireworks is not necessary when we displays run by the councils

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not exactly sure what you what the Government or Parliament to do. In particular, we're not sure what you mean by "further controls". 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

If you want to ban the use of fireworks unless as part of a controlled and/ or organised event, you may wish to sign this petition instead: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/223542
